description: This automated anti-personnel weapon is another product of Iron Mask`s secret Rafflesia Project. The Bugs were created to purge the Earth Sphere of its surplus population, exterminating human beings while causing minimal damage to buildings and natural environments. These machines are capable of detecting humans by their respiration, body heat, or motion, and can attack their prey inside confined spaces like buildings and emergency shelters by deploying 60-centimeter-wide http://anidb.net/ch1773 [Child Bugs]. While their primary purpose is to target civilians, Bugs are also capable of destroying mobile suits, tanks, and other fighting vehicles.
name: Bug
